sep_scene.content: In this image, we see a scene from the movie "The Mummy: The Lost City of Ubar". The main focus is on three men, each dressed in ornate costumes, walking towards a large rock formation. The man in the center, who is holding a spear, is wearing a blue helmet and a blue cloak. To his left, there is another man wearing a red helmet and a red cloak. On the right, there is a man wearing a gold helmet and a gold cloak. The background is filled with smoke and rocks, adding to the dramatic atmosphere of the scene.

The image captures a dramatic scene featuring a man in a red robe and a large dragon-like creature. The man, with long hair and a beard, stands in front of the creature, which is a dark brown color. The creature is in motion, with its long neck and tail kicking up a cloud of dust. The backdrop of the image is a rocky landscape with a mountain in the distance. The man appears to be in a state of awe or fear, as he looks up at the creature. The image is a close-up shot, focusing on the man and the creature, with the background elements providing context to the scene.

In the image, we see the renowned actor Jason Statham, embodying his character from the movie "The Lost City of Ubar". He is standing in a rocky landscape, his face set in a serious expression. His attire is a black leather armor, adorned with a large shield, and a red cape draped over his shoulders. The backdrop is a rugged terrain, with rocks and columns scattered around. The image captures a moment of intense focus, as Jason Statham's character appears to be in a state of contemplation or concern.

The image captures a dramatic scene from the movie "The Lost City of Bar". In the foreground, a man in a red cape and a helmet is seen running towards a large dragon. The dragon, a towering creature with a long neck and sharp teeth, is in motion, its body covered in a layer of dust. The man, appearing to be in a state of panic, is running towards the dragon with a sword in his hand. The backdrop of the image is a rocky landscape under a clear blue sky. The image is a vivid portrayal of a tense moment in the movie, with the man and the dragon as the central figures.

In this image, actors Mark Strong and Jason Bateman are seen in a scene from the movie "The Magnificent Seven". Mark Strong, portraying the character of the leader of the group, is holding a large blue spear. His face is set in a determined expression, reflecting the intensity of the situation. Jason Bateman, playing the character of the man in the middle, is also holding a spear. His face is set in a surprised expression, indicating a sudden event or discovery. They are standing in a rocky landscape, with a mountainous background adding to the dramatic atmosphere of the scene.

The image captures a thrilling scene from the movie "The Old Guard" featuring the actor KiKi Layne. KiKi Layne, portraying the character of the title, is seen running through a desert landscape. The character is in a dynamic pose, holding a sword in one hand and a shield in the other, suggesting a moment of intense action. The backdrop of the image is a rocky desert with a large dragon-like creature looming in the background. The creature, a mix of blue and green, adds a sense of danger and mystery to the scene. The image is a vivid portrayal of the character's struggle against the formidable creature, creating a captivating visual narrative.
